author: eth2_bridge_bot
content:
**protolambda**
Doc on eth2 merkle trees and multiproofs. Speed up lookups, back a partial with it, and run multiproofs without stackframes / allocations (push for cheap ewasm execution): https://github.com/protolambda/eth-merkle-trees
(Also relevant to those looking at merkle DBs, and ongoing effort to optimize MPTs in Geth)

Doc on optimizations (NOT essential to interop, but useful for those that have resources to try implement them): https://github.com/protolambda/eth2-impl-design

author: eth2_bridge_bot
content:
